```{r setup}
library(sortable)
```

## Rank list

This is a rank list app


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
tags$div(
  class = "shiny-app-frame",
  tags$iframe(
    src = "https://andrie-de-vries.shinyapps.io/sortable_rank_list_app/",
    width = "100%",
    height = 450
    )
)
```
